src:
Hasil Pertandingan Timnas Indonesia U-19 vs Timor Leste U-19: Skor 3-1
06 Nov 2019, 20:52 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Timnas Indonesia U-19 menang 3-1 atas Timor Leste U-19 di laga pembuka Grup K Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020 di Stadion Madya, Kompleks Gelora Bung Karno, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Pertandingan berjalan dengan tempo sedang. Pasukan Merah Putih mampu mendominasi jalannya laga dan mendapatkan sejumlah peluang untuk mencetak gol.
Gol-gol Timnas Indonesia U-19 dicetak oleh Fajar Fathur Rahman (brace) dan David Maulana. Sementara gol Timor Leste U-19 dihasilkan oleh penalti Mouzinho De Lima.
Timor Leste U-19 sendiri bermain dengan 10 pemain saja. Sebab Nelson Dos Reis dikartu merah langsung oleh wasit.

Babak Pertama

Indonesia langsung berusaha untuk menggempur pertahanan Timor Leste. Skuat Garuda menebar ancaman dari berbagai sisi.Hasilnya, pasukan Fakhri Husaini ini bisa mencetak gol cepat pada menit kedua. Umpan sepak pojok dari sisi kanan berhasil ditanduk olehFathur Rahman yang berdiri bebas tak terkawal. 1-0.
Gol ini terasa seperti awal yang menjanjikan. Namun sayang setelah itu mereka kesulitan untuk bisa mencetak gol kedua. Hal ini membuat Timor Leste sedikit berani untuk sesekali berusaha memberikan ancaman pada pertahanan skuat Merah Putih.
Pada menit ke-23, Timor Leste sempat mengancam melalui Paulo Freitas yang lolos dari perangkap offside. Untung, Ernando dengan sigap masih bisa mengamankan bola.
Pada menit ke-30, Rizky Ridho melepas tendangan bebas. Namun kiper Timor Leste masih bisa menghalaunya. Bola rebound berusaha untuk disambar oleh Fillo Numberi, namun lagi Junildo Pereira masih bisa mengamankan gawangnya.
Jelang akhir babak pertama, ada peluang yang diciptakan oleh Bagus Kahfi. Sayang setelah mengecoh beberapa pemain lawan, bola tendangan kaki kanannya malah melenceng dari gawang Timor Leste.
Pada akhirnya tak ada lagi gol yang tercipta. Timnas Indonesia U-19 unggul 1-0 atas Timor Leste U-19
text:
Indonesian U-19 National Team vs East Timor U-19: Score 3-1
Nov 6 2019, 20:52 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Indonesian U-19 national team won 3-1 over East Timor U-19 in the opening match of Group K AFC U-19 2020 Qualifiers at Madya Stadium, Bung Karno Complex, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
The game is running at a moderate tempo. Red and White troops are able to dominate the course of action and get a number of opportunities to score goals.
Indonesia U-19 national team goals scored by Fajar Fathur Rahman (brace) and David Maulana. While the Timor Leste U-19 goal was scored by Mouzinho De Lima's penalty.
Timor Leste U-19 itself plays with only 10 players. Because Nelson Dos Reis was immediately red-carded by the referee.

First round

Indonesia immediately tried to storm East Timor's defense. Garuda's squad spread threats from various sides. As a result, Fakhri Husaini's troops were able to score quick goals in the second minute. Corner kick from the right side successfully headlong by Fathur Rahman who stood free without guard. 1-0.
This goal feels like a promising start. But unfortunately after that they had difficulty being able to score the second goal. This makes Timor Leste a little brave to occasionally try to threaten the defense of the Red and White squad.
In the 23rd minute, Timor Leste had threatened through Paulo Freitas who escaped the offside trap. Fortunately, Ernando was swiftly able to secure the ball.
In the 30th minute, Rizky Ridho took off a free kick. But the East Timorese goalkeeper can still keep him away. The rebound tried to be struck by Fillo Numberi, but again Junildo Pereira was still able to secure the net.
Near the end of the first round, there was an opportunity created by Bagus Kahf. Unfortunately, after outwitting several opposing players, the ball kicking his right foot instead deviated from the goal of Timor Leste.
In the end no more goals are created. The Indonesian national team U-19 winning 1-0 over East Timor U-19
